appetizers.name: Toast
appetizers.description: Fire-toasted artisan sourdough spread with house-churned mantequilla. Side of fresh berry compote

hot sandwiches.name: rueben
hot sandwiches.description: As you may have found out on that band trip in high school, the letters in 'our rueben sandwiches' can be rearranged to spell 'boner sandwiches'. Classic.

desserts.name: It's-it
desserts.description: 'Oh man, I'd punch a wagonload of kittens for an Its-It right now' - Everyone not in the Bay Area

desserts.name: foo.bar
ingredients: I don't know, probably chocolate or something
desserts.description: Everyone says it's great, but is it worth it?

drinks.name: water
drinks.description: Miraculous live-giving fluid that your body turns into pee.
